title: 2 Easy Ways to Remove TikTok Filters and Effects

steps.title: Open the TikTok app on your mobile device.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app on your mobile device. This is the multi-colored music note with a black background. [1] X Research source If needed, you can install TikTok . TikTok is available for iOS in the App Store and for Android in the Google Play Store . If you aren't already logged in, tap Log in to do so now, or tap Sign up to create an account.

steps.title: Access your drafts.
steps.content: Access your drafts. Tap your Profile at the bottom-right corner, then tap the first tab below your bio. You can remove the filter on a TikTok as long as it is still in your drafts. You can edit the filter before or after recording the video. You cannot remove the filter of a posted TikTok. You'll need to delete the TikTok , edit the video, and upload it again.

steps.title: Tap the video with the filter you want to remove.
steps.content: Tap the video with the filter you want to remove. After tapping, you'll be brought to the video's editing page.

steps.title: Tap Effects in right panel.
steps.content: Tap Effects in right panel. This will be above Filters . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the back arrow.
steps.content: Tap the back arrow. This will undo any effects applied to your video.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . Your changes will be saved. If you want to remove a filter, tap Filters in the right panel. A pop-up menu will open. Tap the cancel button on the left side of the menu.

steps.title: Tap Next.
steps.content: Tap Next . This will save your changes. You can now continue to create TikTok videos free of filters and effects. Tap Drafts to return the video to your drafts or tap Post to post the video as is.

steps.title: Open the TikTok app on your mobile device.
steps.content: Open the TikTok app on your mobile device. This is the multi-colored music note with a black background. If you aren't already logged in, tap Log in to do so now, or tap Sign up to create an account.

steps.title: Tap +.
steps.content: Tap + . This can be found at the bottom of the screen. This is how you can create a new TikTok. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the applied effect.
steps.content: Tap the applied effect. When you tap the effect again, it will deselect the current effect. If you want to remove a filter, tap Filters in the right panel. A pop-up menu will open. Tap the cancel button on the left side of the menu.

steps.title: Tap the red check mark, then Next.
steps.content: Tap the red check mark, then Next . This will save your changes. Tap Drafts to return the video to your drafts or tap Post to post the video as is.
